nodes.id: 国民革命军陆军新编第四军

zh-cn: 国民革命军陆军新编第四军
国民革命军新编第四军

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共合作期间，由第五次反围剿失败后留在南方八省进行游击战争的中国工农红军和游击队改编而成的军队，由中国共产党领导。
description.en: An army unit formed during the Second United Front, created by reorganizing the Chinese Red Army and guerrilla units that remained in the eight southern provinces after the failure of the Fifth Encirclement Campaign. It was led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期，中国国民党和中国共产党再度合作组成的民族统一战线。
description.en: The national united front formed by the Kuomintang (KMT) and the Communist Party of China (CPC) during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在国共内战时期建立的军队。
description.en: The armed forces of the Communist Party of China during the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，新四军的创建者和主要领导人之一，曾任新四军副军长。在皖南事变突围后被叛徒杀害。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China, a founder and one of the main leaders of the New Fourth Army, serving as its deputy commander. He was murdered by a traitor after breaking out of the encirclement during the Southern Anhui Incident.

nodes.id: 中华苏维埃共和国中央革命军事委员会

zh-cn: 中华苏维埃共和国中央革命军事委员会
中共中央革命军事委员会
en: Central Revolutionary Military Commission of the Chinese Soviet Republic

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在中华苏维埃共和国时期的最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The highest military leadership body of the Communist Party of China during the Chinese Soviet Republic period.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期，中华民国国民政府划分的战区之一。
description.en: One of the war zones designated by the Nationalist Government of the Republic of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府时期的最高军事统率机关。
description.en: The supreme military command organ of the Nationalist Government of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事家，中国人民解放军创始人之一，新四军首任军长。在皖南事变中被国民政府扣押，获释后因空难去世。
description.en: A Chinese military strategist, one of the founders of the People's Liberation Army, and the first commander of the New Fourth Army. He was detained by the Nationalist Government during the Southern Anhui Incident and died in a plane crash after his release.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事家、政治家，中华人民共和国元帅。曾任新四军第一支队司令员，皖南事变后任新四军代军长。
description.en: A Chinese military strategist and politician, and a Marshal of the People's Republic of China. He served as the commander of the New Fourth Army's First Detachment and became the acting commander after the Southern Anhui Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，中华人民共和国第二任主席。曾任新四军政治委员。
description.en: A Chinese politician, the second Chairman of the People's Republic of China. He served as the political commissar of the New Fourth Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战时期的主力部队之一，由新四军和山东军区部队主力改编而成。
description.en: One of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army during the Second Chinese Civil War, formed from the main units of the New Fourth Army and the Shandong Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战时期的主力部队之一，其部分兵力源自北上的新四军第3师。
description.en: One of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army during the Second Chinese Civil War, with part of its strength originating from the New Fourth Army's 3rd Division which moved north.

en: Fourth Army of the National Revolutionary Army

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军的著名部队，因在北伐战争中战功卓著而被称为“铁军”。
description.en: A famous unit of the National Revolutionary Army, known as the 'Iron Army' for its distinguished service in the Northern Expedition.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，国民革命军对新四军军部所发动的一次军事打击，导致新四军遭受重大损失。
description.en: A military attack launched by the National Revolutionary Army against the headquarters of the New Fourth Army during the Second Sino-Japanese War, resulting in heavy losses for the New Fourth Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代政治家、军事家，曾任中华民国总统及国民政府军事委员会委员长。在皖南事变后下令取消新四军番号。
description.en: A modern Chinese politician and military leader, former President of the Republic of China and Chairman of the Nationalist Government's Military Affairs Commission. He ordered the cancellation of the New Fourth Army's designation after the Southern Anhui Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党军事将领，曾任新四军政治部主任，在皖南事变中牺牲。
description.en: A military general of the Communist Party of China, who served as the Director of the Political Department of the New Fourth Army and was killed in the Southern Anhui Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党军事将领，曾任新四军副参谋长。在皖南事变突围后被叛徒杀害。
description.en: A military general of the Communist Party of China, who served as the Deputy Chief of Staff of the New Fourth Army. He was murdered by a traitor after breaking out of the encirclement during the Southern Anhui Incident.

description.zh-cn: 新四军副官，在皖南事变后杀害了项英和周子昆。
description.en: An adjutant in the New Fourth Army who murdered Xiang Ying and Zhou Zikun after the Southern Anhui Incident.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间新四军与韩德勤所率国民革命军之间的一场战役，新四军获胜。
description.en: A battle between the New Fourth Army and the National Revolutionary Army led by Han Deqin during the Second Sino-Japanese War, which resulted in a victory for the New Fourth Army.

description.zh-cn: 国民党将领，时任江苏省省长。其部队在黄桥战役中被新四军击败。
description.en: A Kuomintang general and then-governor of Jiangsu Province. His troops were defeated by the New Fourth Army in the Battle of Huangqiao.

description.zh-cn: 国民党高级将领，时任第三战区司令长官，指挥了对皖南新四军的围攻。
description.en: A high-ranking Kuomintang general, then-commander of the Third War Area, who commanded the siege against the New Fourth Army in Southern Anhui.

description.zh-cn: 1946年发生于山西省兴县黑茶山的一起飞机坠毁事故，导致包括叶挺在内的多名中共高级干部遇难。
description.en: A plane crash that occurred in 1946 in Heicha Mountain, Xing County, Shanxi Province, resulting in the deaths of several high-ranking CPC officials, including Ye Ting.

relationships.target: 国民革命军陆军新编第四军

description.zh-cn: 新四军是在第二次国共合作的背景下，根据国共两党谈判达成的协议改编而成的军队。
description.en: The New Fourth Army was an army unit reorganized according to an agreement reached through negotiations between the KMT and the CPC under the context of the Second United Front.

relationships.target: 国民革命军陆军新编第四军

description.zh-cn: 新四军由南方八省的红军和游击队整编而成。
description.en: The New Fourth Army was formed by reorganizing the Red Army and guerrilla units from the eight southern provinces.

relationships.target: 国民革命军陆军新编第四军

description.zh-cn: 文本中明确指出新四军主要由项英创建。
description.en: The text explicitly states that the New Fourth Army was primarily founded by Xiang Ying.

relationships.source: 国民革命军陆军新编第四军
relationships.target: 中华苏维埃共和国中央革命军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 新四军由中共中央革命军事委员会领导。
description.en: The New Fourth Army was led by the Central Revolutionary Military Commission of the CPC.

relationships.source: 国民革命军陆军新编第四军

description.zh-cn: 新四军被编入第三战区战斗序列。
description.en: The New Fourth Army was incorporated into the order of battle of the Third War Area.

relationships.target: 国民革命军陆军新编第四军

description.zh-cn: 叶挺被任命为新四军军长。
description.en: Ye Ting was appointed as the commander of the New Fourth Army.

relationships.target: 国民革命军陆军新编第四军

description.zh-cn: 项英被任命为新四军副军长。
description.en: Xiang Ying was appointed as the deputy commander of the New Fourth Army.

relationships.target: 国民革命军陆军新编第四军

description.zh-cn: 陈毅在皖南事变后被任命为新四军代军长。
description.en: Chen Yi was appointed as the acting commander of the New Fourth Army after the Southern Anhui Incident.

relationships.target: 国民革命军陆军新编第四军

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇在皖南事变后被任命为新四军政治委员。
description.en: Liu Shaoqi was appointed as the political commissar of the New Fourth Army after the Southern Anhui Incident.

description.zh-cn: 叶挺因其与国民革命军第四军（“铁军”）的渊源，而选择“新四军”这一番号，意在继承其精神。
description.en: Due to his history with the National Revolutionary Army's Fourth Army (the 'Iron Army'), Ye Ting chose the designation 'New Fourth Army' to signify the inheritance of its spirit.

relationships.source: 国民革命军陆军新编第四军

description.zh-cn: 在黄桥战役中，新四军击败了韩德勤率领的国民革命军部队。
description.en: In the Battle of Huangqiao, the New Fourth Army defeated the National Revolutionary Army troops led by Han Deqin.

description.zh-cn: 顾祝同指挥国民革命军部队包围和袭击了皖南的新四军军部。
description.en: Gu Zhutong commanded the National Revolutionary Army forces that encircled and attacked the New Fourth Army headquarters in Southern Anhui.

relationships.target: 国民革命军陆军新编第四军

description.zh-cn: 皖南事变导致新四军军部遭受重大损失，约9000人的部队大部牺牲或被俘。
description.en: The Southern Anhui Incident caused heavy losses to the New Fourth Army headquarters, with most of its approximately 9,000 troops killed or captured.

relationships.target: 国民革命军陆军新编第四军

description.zh-cn: 皖南事变后，蒋介石下令取消新四军番号。
description.en: After the Southern Anhui Incident, Chiang Kai-shek ordered the cancellation of the New Fourth Army's designation.

description.zh-cn: 新四军军长叶挺在皖南事变中被国民政府扣押。
description.en: New Fourth Army commander Ye Ting was detained by the Nationalist Government during the Southern Anhui Incident.

description.zh-cn: 新四军政治部主任袁国平在皖南事变中牺牲。
description.en: Yuan Guoping, Director of the Political Department of the New Fourth Army, was killed during the Southern Anhui Incident.

description.zh-cn: 项英在皖南事变突围后被其副官刘厚总杀害。
description.en: Xiang Ying was murdered by his adjutant Liu Houzong after breaking out from the Southern Anhui Incident.

description.zh-cn: 周子昆在皖南事变突围后被副官刘厚总杀害。
description.en: Zhou Zikun was murdered by adjutant Liu Houzong after breaking out from the Southern Anhui Incident.

description.zh-cn: 叶挺获释后乘飞机去延安途中，因黑茶山空难遇难身亡。
description.en: After his release, Ye Ting died in the Heicha Mountain air crash while flying to Yan'an.

relationships.source: 国民革命军陆军新编第四军

description.zh-cn: 新四军番号撤销后，其主力部队与山东军区一部合编为华东野战军。
description.en: After the designation of the New Fourth Army was abolished, its main forces were combined with parts of the Shandong Military Region to form the East China Field Army.

relationships.source: 国民革命军陆军新编第四军

description.zh-cn: 原新四军第3师于1945年开赴东北，后编入东北民主联军（东北野战军前身）。
description.en: The former 3rd Division of the New Fourth Army moved to the Northeast in 1945 and was later incorporated into the Northeast Democratic United Army (predecessor of the Northeast Field Army).
